reviewText:
Very very bland game...

There is very little to do in this game, I have seen way better games for cheaper.
Simply find words in a bloon filled game and thats it.
The music can get really irritating quickly.
There is no Trading Cards, Achievements so no need to actually waste time trying to achieve something, the leaderboards are also empty as no one has played this game, and seeing as the content is near nothing, I can't blame people.
voteText: 17 of 19 people (89%) found this review helpful 3 people found this review funny

reviewText:
Like the classic Bookworm Adventures, this is a fun and simple word game, where you just need to find words in the balloon cloud.

The main attraction here, is the possibility of playing the game in another language than English.
German is the altenative language, but if the developers were smart, they would quickly add in other languages or even Workshop support for user defined dictionaries.

reviewText: https://youtu.be/Mv6xqAWwAOM\n\nThis helium filled word search game covers the basics mechanics of the genre, but the weak interface and bad letter distribution keeps it from getting off the ground.
